availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: T. Cornelius Nall (Hardin Co, Ky, farmer, lieut 2nd Ky cav USA)

body.p: Hardin County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Carpenter in Hardin County in 1860. Served in the 2nd Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as second lieutenant and first lieutenant.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 57.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hardin County, District 2, p. 25.
